ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
One demanding, demanded the chastisement which must befall
The unbelievers-- there is none to avert it--
From Allah, the Lord of the ways of Ascent.

ayas.arabic: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
ayas.translation: To Him ascend the angels and the Spirit in a day the measure of which is fifty thousand years.
ayas.transliteration: ta`rujul malā-ikatu war rūḥu ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miqdāruhu khamsīna alfa sanah

ayas.translation: Therefore endure with a goodly patience.
Surely they think it to be far off,
And We see it nigh.
On the day when the heaven shall be as molten copper
And the mountains shall be as tufts of wool
And friend shall not ask of friend

ayas.arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
ayas.translation: (Though) they shall be made to see each other. The guilty one would fain redeem himself from the chastisement of that day by (sacrificing) his children,
ayas.transliteration: yubaṣṣarūnahum ۚ yawaddul mujrimu law yaftadī min `adhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīh

ayas.translation: And his wife and his brother
And the nearest of his kinsfolk who gave him shelter,

ayas.arabic: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
ayas.translation: And all those that are in the earth, (wishing) then (that) this might deliver him.
ayas.transliteration: wa man fil-arḍi jamī`an thumma yunjīh

ayas.translation: By no means! Surely it is a flaming fire
Dragging by the head,
It shall claim him who turned and fled (from truth),
And amasses (wealth) then shuts it up.
Surely man is created of a hasty temperament
Being greatly grieved when evil afflicts him
And niggardly when good befalls him
Except those who pray,
Those who are constant at their prayer
And those in whose wealth there is a fixed portion.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna fī amwālihim ḥaqqun ma`lūm

ayas.translation: For him who begs and for him who is denied (good)
And those who accept the truth of the judgment day

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who are fearful of the chastisement of their Lord--
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum min `adhābi rabbihim mushfiqūn

ayas.translation: Surely the chastisement of their Lord is (a thing) not to be felt secure of--
And those who guard their private parts,

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
ayas.translation: Except in the case of their wives or those whom their right hands possess-- for these surely are not to be blamed,
ayas.transliteration: illā `alā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
ayas.translation: But he who seeks to go beyond this, these it is that go beyond the limits--
And those who are faithful to their trusts and their covenant
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum li-amānātihim wa`ahdihim rā`ūn

ayas.translation: And those who are upright in their testimonies,
And those who keep a guard on their prayer,
Those shall be in gardens, honored.
But what is the matter with those who disbelieve that they hasten on around you,
On the right hand and on the left, in sundry parties?

ayas.arabic: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Does every man of them desire that he should be made to enter the garden of bliss?
ayas.transliteration: ayaṭma`u kullum-ri-in minhum an yudkhala jannata na`īm

ayas.translation: By no means! Surely We have created them of what they know.

ayas.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
ayas.translation: But nay! I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests that We are certainly able
ayas.transliteration: falā uqsimu birabbil mashāriqi wal maghāribi innā laqādirūn

ayas.arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
ayas.translation: To bring instead (others) better than them, and We shall not be overcome.
ayas.transliteration: `alā an nubaddila khayran minhum wa mā naḥnu bimasbūqīn

ayas.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Therefore leave them alone to go on with the false discourses and to sport until they come face to face with that day of theirs with which they are threatened;
ayas.transliteration: fadharhum yakhūḍū wayal`abū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī yū`adūn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
ayas.translation: The day on which they shall come forth from their graves in haste, as if they were hastening on to a goal,
ayas.transliteration: yawma yakhrujūna minal-ajdāthi sirā`an ka-annahum ilā nuṣubiy yūfiḍūn

ayas.arabic: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Their eyes cast down; disgrace shall overtake them; that is the day which they were threatened with.
ayas.transliteration: khāshi`atan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillah ۚ dhālikal yawmul ladhī kānū yū`adūn
